title: Orientation Roadshow
author: RAMSC
summary: Meet RAMSC, explore services, and discover how to get involved across campuses.
paragraphs: The Orientation Roadshow brings the council to new students across campuses, offering a first-hand look at services and initiatives.
Participants can connect with leaders, explore volunteer opportunities, and learn how RAMSC supports student life.

🎉 Welcome to the Official RAMSC Website! Dear fellow students and visitors, We are excited to officially launch the Ramathibodi Medical Student Council (RAMSC) website — a new platform designed to bring our community closer together. Here, you’ll find: 📅 Event updates & activities – Stay informed about what’s happening in our faculty. 📝 Announcements & resources – Access important information with ease. 🤝 Student initiatives & opportunities – Discover ways to connect, contribute, and grow. Our goal is to make this website not just a source of information, but a space that reflects the spirit, creativity, and dedication of Ramathibodi medical students. Thank you for being part of this journey with us. We look forward to building this platform together — and we can’t wait to hear your feedback as we continue to grow. Welcome aboard, and happy exploring! 🌟

title: Peer & Near-Peer Coaching
author: RAMSC
summary: Small-group learning with mentors—pre-clinic and clinic tracks available.
paragraphs: Our coaching program pairs juniors with experienced mentors for targeted study support.
Sessions are tailored for both pre-clinic and clinic stages, building knowledge and community.

title: Well-Being Workshops
author: RAMSC
summary: Stress management, self-awareness, and mental health support series.
paragraphs: These workshops help students cultivate resilience through practical tools and peer discussion.
Topics range from mindfulness to time management, fostering a supportive environment.
